name: Sticky Mission
description:
You are sent on a mission by your alien commander (well, alien to us humans; it's just your commander to you). You need to collect a sample from this planet. In particular, you are tasked with grabbing a human domicile. Your ship is too small to be able to grab it, but the ship has a trick. It can attach onto other objects to make itself bigger so it can attach larger objects. Get yourself big enough to pick up the house to complete the game.

This was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 in less than 48 hours. I made this project because I wanted to experiment with how the main mechanic would work in the Godot engine.

Developed using the Godot engine, licensed under the MIT license

The art assets are from the Kenney Game Assets 1, licensed under the CC0 1.0 license
